sub_title: SQL Developer and DBA at Barclays Global Services India
summary:
•	7 years of experience as SQL Developer / Application DBA & ETL Developer in MS SQL Server.
•	Extensive SQL Development experience in Telecom and Banking domain with a strong understanding of data & analytics. 
•	Experienced in creating Databases, Tables, Stored Procedures, Views, Indexes, Cursors, Triggers, User Defined Functions.
•	Strong working experience with writing and optimizing SQL queries.
•	Hands on experience on Partitioning and implementation of slide window partitioning for large tables.
•	Experience in SSIS to build Data Integration and Workflow Solutions, Extract, Transform and Load (ETL) solutions for Data warehousing applications.
•	Hands on experience in installation, configuration, performance tuning, optimization, backup and recovery in SQL Server 2012/2008.
•	Experience in creating jobs, schedule SSIS Packages using SQL Server Agent. 
•	Excellent Verbal & Written Communication skills and strong in Documentation. 
•	Flexible, enthusiastic and project-oriented team player with leadership skills to develop creative solutions based on client needs. 


P.S 
I am on career break since 2015 , and now want to challenge my abilities again.

school.name: KRT Arts, BH Commerce and AM Science (KTHM) College, Nashik

profile_positions.title: SQL Developer and Administrator

profile_positions.description:
•	Designed, Implemented and maintained Database Schema, Tables, Stored procedures, Functions and Triggers, Constraints, Indexes, Schemas, Functions, Views, Defaults and complex SQL statements. 
•	Created Triggers to enforce data & referential integrity and Implemented failure alerts in SSIS.
•	Implemented failure alerts using email in SSIS. 
•	Managed database instances, monitor server performance, tune the database server and perform backup and recovery.
•	Created indexes for the quick retrieval of the data from the database and Triggers to enforce data and referential integrity. 
•	Created ETL packages using various data sources and then loaded the data into destination tables by performing different kinds of transformations using SSIS.
•	Responsible for installation and configuration of SQL server 2005/2000. Managed database instances, monitor server performance, tune the database server and perform backup and recovery.
